conclusion: Determine the output power of the power source when connected to resistor R using P = IV.
Intersection point of lines I and II is at (2 A, 2 V).
Current I is 2 A and voltage V is 2 V from the intersection point.
Calculate output power P using P = IV: P = 2 A * 2 V = 4 W.
The output power of the power source is 4 W.
